description:
Washinomori loses the spring game. After going through this incident, Sakamoto becomes more active and more interactive with other players. Sakamoto tells Kurokan that heâ€™s ready to join professional baseball! Meanwhile, the tension between the second graders and freshmen could explode anytime!
Morioka accidently gets a tape of the game where Sakamoto has 21 consecutive strikeouts. He wants to have a fair game and intentds to reject the help. After he knows that there is only Kurokan in Hitomi`s eyes, he takes the tape back.
Source: crunchyroll
